Class MovesManagement

java.lang.Object
model.MovesManagement
public class MovesManagement extends Object
The MovesManagement class is part of MODEL. It handles the management/logic of a collection of Moves objects. This class provides the following functions, set an array of Moves, get an array of Moves, search for moves by attribute, and add a new move.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovesManagement

      public MovesManagement()
      Constructs a new empty MovesManagement. An ArrayList is initialized, hence becoming this object's empty moves list.

  • Method Details

    • setMoveList

      public void setMoveList(ArrayList<Moves> moveList)
      Replaces the entire moves list with a new one, filtering out any null entries.
      Parameters:
      moveList - The new list of Moves to be managed.

    • getMoves

      public ArrayList<Moves> getMoves()
      Returns the current list of managed Moves.
      Returns:
      The list of Moves.

    • searchMoves

      public ArrayList<Moves> searchMoves(String attribute, String keyword)
      Searches the moves list by a specific attribute and keyword. Supported attributes:
      • name - Matches move names containing the keyword
      • classification - Matches move classification containing the keyword
      • type - Matches move type containing the keyword
      Parameters:
      attribute - The attribute to search by (e.g., "name", "classification", or "type").
      keyword - The value to match in the given attribute.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Moves that match the search criteria.

    • addMove

      public void addMove(Moves m)
      Adds a new Moves object to the list.
      Parameters:
      m - The Moves object to be added.
